summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 2876, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Williamson Street from the south line of Madison Street to the north line of Yesler Avenue, by grading the same and constructing sidewalks on both side thereof, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds", and establishing a fund for such payment by assessment upon all lots or parcels of land benefited by such improvement, under the provisions of Ordinance No. 2085, approved April 29, 1892, and the City Charter as amended and now in force."
